characters: ON THE REAR OF THE DECK
A SERIES OF "WALL-E AT WORK" MOMENTS
ON VARIOUS LOCATIONS ON THE AXIOM
BACK UP IN THE CAPTAIN'S QUARTERS
ON OTHER SIDE OF BOULDER CRATER
LOUIS ARMSTRONG'S "LA VIE EN ROSE" PLAYS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stars. The upbeat show tune, Put On Your Sunday Clothes, plays.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Out there, there's a world outside of Yonkers..."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: More stars. Distant galaxies, constellations, nebulas... A single planet. Drab and brown. Moving towards it. Pushing through its polluted atmosphere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "...Close your eyes and see it glisten..."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A range of mountains takes form in the haze. Moving closer. The mountains are piles of TRASH. The entire surface is nothing but waste.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "...We're gonna find adventure in the evening air..."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A silhouetted city in the distance. What looks like skyscrapers turns into trash. Thousands of neatly stacked CUBES OF TRASH, stories high. Rows and rows of stacked cubes, like city avenues. They go on for miles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "...Beneath your parasol the world is all a smile..."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something moving on the ground far below. A figure at the foot of a trash heap. A SMALL SERVICE ROBOT diligently cubing trash. Rusted, ancient. Cute. Every inch of him engineered for trash compacting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mini-shovel hands collect junk. Scoop it into his open chassis. His front plate closes slowly, compressing waste. A faded label on his corroded chest plate: "Waste Allocation Loader - Earth Class" (WALL-E)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E spits out a cube of trash. Stacks it with the others.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something catches his eye. Tugs on a piece of metal stuck in the stack. A hubcap. The sun reflects off it. Wall-E checks the sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sun sets through the smoggy haze.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "...And we won't come back until we've kissed a girl --"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He places the hubcap in his compactor. Presses a button on his chest. The song stops playing. The end of a work day.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E attaches a lunch cooler to his back. Whistles for his pet COCKROACH. The insect hops on his shoulder. They motor down from the top of a GIANT TRASH TOWER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E travels alone. Traverses miles of desolate waste. Oblivious to roving storms of toxic weather.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Passes haunting structures buried within the trash. Buildings, highways, entire cities... Everything branded with the SAME COMPANY LOGO. "Buy N Large" "BNL" stores, restaurants, banks...transportation! The corporation ran every aspect of life. There's even a BNL LOGO on Wall-E's chest plate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON NEWSPAPER Wall-E drives over. Headline: "TOO MUCH TRASH!! Earth Covered!!" The deck: "BNL CEO Declares Global Emergency!" A photo of the BNL CEO giving a weak smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E's old treads are threadbare. Practically falling apart. Cause a bumpy ride for his cockroach. He passes the remains of other RUSTED WALL-E UNITS. Fancies one with NEWER TREADS than his own...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E now sports the newer treads. Rolls past a SERIES OF HOLOGRAPHIC BILLBOARDS. The solar-powered ads still activate when he passes them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Ad #1: BNL logo over trash) Too much garbage in your face? (Ad #2: starliner in space) There's plenty of space out in space! (Ad #3: starliners take off from Earth) BNL starliners leaving each day. (Ad #4: WALL-E units wave goodbye) We'll clean up the mess while you're away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E drives down a deserted overpass. Activates an even LARGER HOLOGRAPHIC BILLBOARD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shows off a CITY-SIZED LUXURY STARLINER. Depicts passengers enjoying all its amenities.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The jewel of the BNL fleet: "The Axiom". Spend your five year cruise in style. Waited on 24 hours a day by our fully automated crew, while your Captain and Autopilot chart a course for non-stop entertainment, fine dining. And with our all-access hover chairs, even Grandma can join the fun! There's no need to walk! "The Axiom". Putting the "star" in Executive Starliner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The BNL CEO appears at the end. Waves goodbye as the Axiom takes off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because, at BNL, space is the final "fun"- tier.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The holographic billboard powers off. Reveals the AXIOM'S DESERTED LAUNCHPAD in the distance. The mammoth structure sits across the bay. Now empty and dry. A polluted, dead valley.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Near its edge rests a WALL-E UNIT TRANSPORT TRUCK. A giant child's Tonka Truck left to weather the elements. A "Buy N Large" logo on its side. Wall-E approaches the rear of the truck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pulls on a lever. The back lowers. Wall-E motors up the ramp.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Open racks for storing WALL-Es line both walls. KNICKKNACKS OF FOUND JUNK littered everywhere. The tired robot removes his newfound treads. Ahh... Home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E motors down the center aisle. Flicks on an ancient BETAMAX PLAYER. Jury-rigged to an iPod. Pushes in a cassette labeled, "Hello Dolly!" The image is very poor quality. Actors sing and dance to Put On Your Sunday Clothes (POYS The same song Wall-E worked to.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: [Hums POYSC]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E opens his cooler. Newfound knickknacks. Pulls out the hubcap from his chest. Looks back at the TV. Mimics the dancers on the screen. Pretends the hubcap is a hat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Continues to unpack: A spork. A Rubik's Cube (unsolved). A Zippo Lighter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He presses a BUTTON by the rack of shelves. They rotate until an empty space appears. His new items are lovingly added to the shelf. The Zippo joins a pre-existing LIGHTER COLLECTION.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A new song, It Only Takes A Moment, plays on the video. Wall-E is drawn to it. Presses his "Record" button.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two lovers sing gently to one another. They kiss...hold hands...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E tilts his head as he watches. Curious. Holds his own hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E motors outside. Turns over his Igloo cooler to clean it out. Pauses to take in the night sky. STARS struggle to be seen through the polluted haze. Wall-E presses the "Play" button on his chest. The newly sampled It Only Takes A Moment (IOTAM) plays.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The wind picks up. A WARNING LIGHT sounds on Wall-E's chest. He looks out into the night. A RAGING SANDSTORM approaches off the bay...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unfazed, Wall-E heads back in the truck. IOTAM still gently playing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...The massive wave of sand roars closer...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E raises the door. Pauses. WHISTLES for his cockroach to come inside. The door shuts just as the storm hits. Obliterates everything in view.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E alone in the center of his shelter. Unwraps a BNL SPONGECAKE (think Twinkie). Lays it out for the cockroach to sleep in. It happily dives in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E collapses himself into a storable cube. Backs into an empty shelf space. Rocks it like a cradle... ...and shuts down for the night. Outside the wind howls like the Hounds of Hell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E's CHARGE METER flashes "WARNING". He wakes. Unboxes. Groggy and lifeless. Stumbles outside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The morning sun. Wall-E fully exposed in its light. His front panel splayed out like a tanning shield. A solar collector.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His CHARGE METER chimes full. Solar panels fold away into hiding. Wall-E, now awake, collects his lunch cooler. Heads off to work. ...and accidentally runs over the cockroach. Horrified, Wall-E reverses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reveals the FLATTENED INSECT under his tread. The cockroach simply pops back to life. No biggie. Ready to go. Relieved, Wall-E resumes their commute.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - CU of Wall-E's hands digging into garbage. CU of trash being scooped into his chest compactor. A cube lands by the cockroach.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Wall-E discovers a BRA in the garbage. Unsure what it's for. Tries placing it over his eyes, like glasses. Tosses it in his cooler.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Wall-E finds a set of CAR KEYS. Presses the remote lock. Somewhere in the distance a CAR ALARM CHIRPS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Plays with a paddle ball. The ball keeps smacking him in the face. He doesn't like it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Wall-E discovers a DIAMOND RING in a JEWEL CASE. Throws out the ring. Keeps the case. The jewel case drops into the cooler, then... ...A RUBBER DUCKY... ...A BOBBLE HEAD DOLL... ...An OLD BOOT... ...A TROPHY...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Wall-E finds a FIRE EXTINGUISHER. Activates it. FOAM blasts in his face. It's tossed far, far away from his cooler.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Wall-E's shovel hand strikes something solid. Faces a REFRIGERATOR much larger than himself. Now what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - CU on fridge door. A WELDING BEAM moves down its center. It emits from between Wall-E's SPLIT BINOCULAR EYES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door falls apart in two pieces. Reveals...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...a SMALL PLANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: in its early stage of growth. Wall-E is entranced. Carefully, he extracts the section of earth around it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E gently places the plant inside the old boot. Dusts dirt off the leaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Robot and faithful cockroach return home. Wall-E stops short of the threshold. Stares at the ground. Continues staring.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: quivers on the dirt. A single laser point of light. Wall-E moves to touch it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...The dot races along the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E drops his Igloo. Chases after the dot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The dot leads Wall-E deep into the polluted expanse. He is so fixated on it he doesn't notice

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: coming from every direction. All racing into the valley over the contour of the terrai Triangulating towards a center.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E's dot suddenly stops. Slowly he reaches for it. Can't grab it. Just light. ALL THE DOTS converge in front of him. The ground shakes. Wall-E becomes confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doesn't see above him. The SUN growing brighter behind the cloud cover. A noise. Building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket engines. Wall-E senses he should look to the sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now THREE SUNS are descending on him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E runs for it. An enormous COLUMN OF FIRE blocks his path. A second column of fire. A third. Trapped.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E cubes the ground beneath him. Working fast. Noise deafening. Heat rising. Digs in just as a tide of flame carpets the ground...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Then suddenly quiet. Smoke clears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E's head rises out of the dirt. Glows red hot from the heat. Trembles with fright. Everything in shadow. Something very big looms over him. Wall-E climbs out of his hole. Bangs his head on metal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WIDE on a massive SPACESHIP. Rests ominously in the empty bay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A PORTAL on its underside opens. Frightened, Wall-E tries to hide. Nowhere to go. He places a SMALL ROCK on his head. Boxes up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A DEVICE lowers to the ground on a long stem. Scans the surface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E creeps closer for a better look. The device unfolds. Wall-E boxes up again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A CAPSULE descends from a chute in the stem. ROBOT ARMS emerge from the device. Place the capsule on the ground. Press buttons. The capsule falls away in sections, to reveal...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...a PROBE ROBOT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It hovers gracefully above the ground. White. Egg-shaped.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blue-lit eyes. Female. Eve.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E is transfixed. Inches closer. Watches Eve from behind the device. Tilts his head. Time stops. She's the most beautiful thing he's ever seen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve hovers over the ground. A BLUE RAY emits from her front panel. Fans out 180 degrees. Scans random objects and areas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The device rises back into the ship. Exposes Wall-E. He rushes for cover behind the nearest rock. Never takes his eyes off Eve. Watches her float away from the ship. ...from the ship? The ship!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Engines roar back to life. Wall-E digging furiously. The rocket takes off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Smoke clears. Again, a red hot Wall-E peeks out from the ground. Looks for Eve. She is watching the ship rise into the clouds. Waits until it is completely out of sight...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...then Eve rises high up into the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She flies around the bay. Soars like a graceful bird. Does loops in the sky. Zooms right past Wall-E's rock. He is hypnotized.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve descends gently to the ground... Wall-E sneaks up closer. Hides behind another boulder. Slips. Makes a NOISE. Instantly, Eve whips around. Her arm converts into a LASER CANNON. Blasts Wall-E's boulder to smithereens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Smoke clears...All quiet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve, now cold and dangerous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scans the area. No sign of life. All business again. Hovers away to probe more of the planet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E boxed up behind what little remains of the rock. Trembles uncontrollably.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve wanders through the pillars of cubed trash. Scans random areas. Wall-E spies from the shadows. Too frightened to approach. She moves on. He follows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve probes a mound of tires. Wall-E hiding nearby. He flinches at the sight of

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: innocently approaching Eve from behind. She spins around. Blasts the insect. Wall-E is gut-punched.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cockroach climbs out of the smoking crater. Unscathed. Still curious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve finds the insect intriguing. Lowers her arm. The end separates into individual hovering sections...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She lets the insect crawl up her arm. Wiggles into her workings. It tickles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: [Giggles]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E relaxes. CHUCKLES privately.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve sonically picks up Wall-E's location. Locks onto him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arm converts to laser cannon. Fires rapidly. Quick glimpses of Wall-E dodging the blasts. Trash piles are systematically obliterated around him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E now exposed. Nowhere to hide. Boxes himself up. Shakes uncontrollably. Eve holds her fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (electronic hums) [Identify yourself.]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She slowly approaches Wall-E's box. Keeps her gun trained on him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (electronic hums) [Repeat. Identify yourself.]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E peeks out from his box. Doesn't understand a thing she says. Doesn't care. Can't believe she's real. The cockroach climbs down her gun arm. Jumps onto his master.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve scans Wall-E. A RED LIGHT appears on her chest. Buzzes "negative". He's not what she's looking for. She retracts her gun arm. Hovers off. Wall-E watches her go. Lovestruck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: [Sigh.]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve scans through the market. Wall-E follows from a safe distance. A stray puppy-dog.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve glances over at him. Wall-E panics. Bumps into a RACK OF SHOPPING CARTS. Creates an avalanche.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They chase him down a flight of stairs. Wall-E reaches the exit doors. Won't open! Carts pig pile on top of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E perched on the roof. Patiently watches Eve fly. She scans the ground below her, like a searchlight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve comes in for a landing below. Shuts down for the night. Wall-E waits. Quietly sneaks down the refinery fire escape. Accidentally trips. Tumbles to the ground. Eve doesn't wake. Wall-E creeps up to her. Opens his arms wide... ...and measures her. Turns to a pile of trash. Splits open his eyes. Begins welding something...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve powers up again. Does a double take. A TRASH SCULPTURE OF EVE stands in front of her. She hovers away, unimpressed. Doesn't notice Wall-E hiding behind a PILE OF PIPES. Wall-E kicks the pipes in frustration. They roll on top of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Scans a car engine. Negative. Slams the hood shut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Scans a Port-A-Potty. Negative. Slams the door shut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Scans an Apollo capsule. Negative. Slams the hatch shut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Scans a FREIGHTER HOLD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Negative. Slams the lid shut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve hovers over the freighter. Frustrated. Not finding what she's looking for. Wall-E eavesdrops from afar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve flies past the ship's CRANE MAGNET. Gets stuck. Wrestles to free herself. Furious, she BLOWS UP THE ENTIRE SHIP. The reaction startles Wall-E.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve slumps down against a dredged anchor. She gives up. Concerned, Wall-E cautiously approaches. Sits at the other end of the anchor. Both robots stare silently at the fiery wreck. Then... ...slowly, very slowly, Wall-E inches towards her. Musters the courage to speak, when -- She suddenly turns to him:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (hums) [So what's your story?]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E falls backwards with surprise. Me? Eve scrolls through a variety of languages:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (German) [Directive?] (Japanese) [Directive?]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: [Huh?]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Swahili) [Directive?] (English) Directive?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beeps) [Oh, I understand that!]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Directive?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E eagerly turns to some nearby trash. Scoops it into his compactor. Proudly spits out a cube. Points to Eve.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (struggles to speak) Di...rec...t--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Directive?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Classified.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beeps) [Oh. Sorry.]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She scans his CHEST LOGO.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Name?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (struggles again) W-wally? ...Wall-E.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smooth; almost perfect) Wwww-aaaa-leee...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E nearly melts. She says his name so beautifully. Moves closer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E. (giggles) Eve.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E tries to repeat it:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eeee...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (slower) Eve.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eeeaaah?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eeeve. Eeeve.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eee--vah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She giggles again. Wall-E likes making her giggle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eee-vah! Ee --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The wind kicks up. The WARNING LIGHT sounds on Wall-E's chest. He moves to grab her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Gasp!) Eee-vah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (hums) [Hey watch it! Don't come any closer!]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She draws her gun on him. Doesn't understand the danger. The sandstorm rushes up behind her. Too late. Wall-E collapses into a box. The storm hits full force. Eve is instantly lost, disoriented.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E? Wall-E?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WALL-E'S HAND appears out of the dust. Calmly takes Eve's hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The back door lowers. A rush of wind and sand. Wall-E pulls Eve inside. Closes the door. She coughs up dust.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E hits a switch... Strings of CHRISTMAS LIGHTS fill the space. His racks of oddities painted in colored light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An air of enchantment. Eve is taken aback.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beeps) [Come on in.]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She drifts through the sea of knickknacks. Becomes spooked by a SINGING BILLY BASS FISH. Threatens to shoot it, but Wall-E calms her down. He is compelled to show her everything. Hands her an eggbeater... ...bubble wrap (so infectious to pop)... ...a lightbulb (lights when she holds it)... ...the Rubik's Cube (she solves it immediately)... ...his Hello Dolly tape. Curious, she begins unspooling the tape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (loud beeps) [My tape!!]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He grabs it back. Protective. Inserts it carefully into the VCR. Please still work. The movie eventually appears on the TV. Plays a clip of POYSC. Wall-E is relieved.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beeps) [What do you think?]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mimics the dancing for Eve. Encourages her to try. She clumsily hops up and down. Makes dents in the floor. Rattles everything. Wall-E politely stops her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beeps) [How `bout we try a different move?]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Spins in a circle. Arms out. Eve copies. Spins faster, and faster... Too fast. Accidentally strikes Wall-E. He flies into the shelves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve helps him up from the mess. Wall-E's LEFT BINOCULAR EYE falls off. Dangles from two wires. Eve GASPS with concern. Wall-E placates her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beeps) [It's fine.]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Feels his way to the rack of shelves. Rotates them until... ...SPARE WALL-E PARTS appear. Replaces his broken eye with a new one. Eve is relieved.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She eyes his LIGHTER COLLECTION. Flicks open a Zippo. Ignites a FLAME. Wall-E freezes. He had no idea it could do that. Moves closer to inspect it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's the closest he's ever been to Eve. She remains focused on the lighter. Wall-E stares up at her. ...The tiny flame flickering between them... ...The Hello Dolly video plays IOTAM in the background... Suddenly, he is moved to express his love. Musters the courage to open his fingers... ...Timidly reaches his hand out to hers...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- Eve turns and looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E instantly chokes. Pulls his hand back. Eve becomes intrigued with the TV. Scans the image of the lovers singing IOTAM... Wall-E watches her. His infatuation still palpable. Then he remembers...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ee-vah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He rushes to his shelves. Eve watches him rummage through junk. A drum falls down on his head. She giggles, charmed by it all. Something about Wall-E...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She is drawn back to the lovers on TV... ...then the lit Zippo lighter in her hand. A tap on her shoulder. She turns to find Wall-E holding something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The plant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve immediately locks onto it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drops the lighter. In a flash... ...her chest opens... ...a TRACTOR BEAM snatches the plant away... ...stores it inside her... Then she shuts down completely. Only a SINGLE GREEN LIGHT pulsing on her chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E is stunned. What'd I do? Waves his hand in front of her face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ee-vah?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Knocks on her chest plate. No response. Wall-E panics. Gently shakes her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ee-vah?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Still no response.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ee-vah? ...Ee-vah?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CAMERA MOVES IN on the blinking green light...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The morning sun. Wall-E places Eve in his charging spot. Aims her hovering form to face the sun. Waits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Several hot days pass with Wall-E holding vigil in the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - A THUNDERSTORM approaches on the horizon. Wall-E holds an UMBRELLA over Eve. Gets struck by lightning. Holds up another umbrella. Gets struck again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - A SANDSTORM blows through. Wall-E pops out of a dune on the truck's roof. Lifts up an UPSIDE-DOWN BARREL that protected Eve.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Wall-E pries open a panel on Eve's chest. Reveals her pulsing BLUE HEART-BATTERY. Attaches JUMPER CABLES to his own HEART-BATTERY. Tries to connect the other end to hers. An automatic defense system blows him off truck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Wall-E & cockroach take Eve for a walk. Pull her along on a LEASH OF CHRISTMAS LIGHTS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Wall-E gives Eve a boat ride on a LAKE OF SLUDGE. Uses an industrial tire as a boat. Rows like a gondolier with a road sign.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Wall-E sits by the empty bay with Eve. Watches the SUNSET. Burns "WALL-E + EVE" on a public trash can. Tries to pull out her hand to hold it. It snaps back into place, trapping his hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E has set up the TV on the roof. The blank Eve floating next to him. Tries unsuccessfully to play PONG with her. Still no response. Finally, he gives up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: [defeated sigh]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E loads up his cooler. Checks on Eve one more time. Still nothing... Heads off to work, defeated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E simply going through the motions. No spirit in him at all. Stops. Pulls out the Zippo lighter. Flicks it a few times. A RUSH OF WIND blows out the flame. Distant rumbling. Wall-E looks in the direction of his home. A BRIGHT GLOW is lowering down through the clouds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beeps) [Oh no.]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E racing as fast as he can. The cockroach clings onto him for dear life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The RECON SPACESHIP towers over his truck. A ROBOT ARM cherry-picks Eve from the roof. Lifts her up and into the ship's cargo hold. Wall-E racing in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reaches the end of the collapsed bridge ramp. Forced to watch Eve disappear into the ship. The cargo doors slam shut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The first of the THREE ROCKET ENGINES powers up. Wall-E heads down a hill of rubble to the ship. Notices his cockroach tagging along behind him. Leads it back to the top of the hill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beeps) [Stay.]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The insect mopes. Droops its little antennae. Wall-E motors back down to the rocket...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The engines blast a WALL OF SMOKE. Preparation for launch...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve is secured into a slot. Joins a ROW OF OTHER EVE PROBES. All dormant. Only Eve flashes a GREEN LIGHT. The CAMERA DRIFTS BACK out a window...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...where Wall-E steadily climbs up the side. The ship's engines ignite. Wall-E clamps his hands tight to a metal support. The rocket takes off into space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cockroach watches his master go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The spaceship roars through the sky. Wall-E tightens his grip, battling the G's. He looks ahead. SCREAMS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: litter the outer atmosphere. The ship bursts through the layer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The recon ship breaks free of the planet. Its boosters shut down. Wall-E takes in the sudden QUIETNESS OF SPACE. Looks back at his planet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oooh...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Weightlessness takes effect. Wall-E almost floats away. Grabs hold of the ship. Knocks on a WINDOW near Eve.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: E-vah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No response. She remains shut down. Wall-E points out at the stars. It is the most spectacular light show possible. And Wall-E has a front row seat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - The ship flies past the MOON. A BILLBOARD stands next to the abandoned APOLLO MOON ROVE "BNL Outlet Coming Soon."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - The ship passes by the SUN. Wall-E pops open his solar panels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Instantly recharges.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - The ship cruises alongside SATURN'S OUTER RINGS. Wall-E runs his hand through the tiny particles of ice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A DUMBBELL NEBULA slowly twists in space. Wall-E is mesmerized by it. Leads his eye to a LIGHT, growing in the distance ahead. A planet? No. A starliner. Gigantic in size.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The "AXIOM".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The now tiny recon ship heads straight for it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TWO TUG-ROCKETS guide the ship in. It locks into GIANT BRACES fixed on the deck. The impact knocks Wall-E off. He lands in the scaffolding of the front brace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly the entire dock comes to life. Robotic arms and service robots of all types appear. ...Rise from the floor... ..Lower from the ceiling... It's a cacophony of automation. They all attend to the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: and four other probes slide out of the ship's side. Suspended in a horizontal rack. Wall-E is surprised to find her facing him. She remains shut down. Just a few feet away with a giant abyss between them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ee-vah... ?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SQUAD OF CLEANER ROBOTS emerge onto the dock. A small roller BRUSH-BOT (M-O) leads.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beeps) [Hold up.]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Waits for the FLOOR LINES to appear. Depict their exact path of action.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beeps) [Okay. Go.]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They file out on the line.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A crane-bot lowers Eve from the rack. M-O and his cleaning crew stand ready. M-O scans Eve.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scan reads: "%16 Foreign Contaminant."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: M-O is disgusted. Revs his brush roller. Moves in for the clean. A VACU-BOT follows after him. Then a SPRAY-BOT and BUFFER-BOT finish off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cleaning crew waits for probe #2. Wall-E studies the routine. Figures out a way to climb down to Eve. When the crane returns, Wall-E poses as probe #3. The crane grabs him instead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: M-O turns around to clean the next probe. Wall-E is lowered in front of him. Boxes up. Confused, M-O scans him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scan reads: "%100 Foreign Contaminant." M-O is horrified by such filth. A RED SIREN LIGHT rises from his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: [Oh, no, no, no. This is all wrong.]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He scrubs Wall-E full force. Wall-E's front panel pushes him away. Confused, M-O moves to clean him again. Wall-E backs away. Leaves a DIRT TRAIL. M-O curses:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: [You made the floor all dirty! Stop it!]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: M-O furiously scrubs the floor. Wall-E peeks out, amused by this neurotic little guy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two STEWARD ROBOTS come out of the wall. Act like hovering caution signs. A small robot (GOPHER) shoots out a PNEUMATIC TUBE. He bears epaulet like shoulders and a siren for a face. Gopher beeps an ELECTRONIC ORDER for the Stewards to foll

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: M-O just finishes cleaning the floor. Wall-E is fascinated. Impishly makes another mark. M-O compulsively cleans it. Can't resist.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: [Look, it stays clean. You got that?]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E wipes the bottom of his tread on M-O's face. M-O loses it. Scrubs his own face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gopher and his steward escort arrive. The cleaning crew stand at attention. Wall-E boxes back up with the probes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gopher begins scanning each probe. Moves down the line. Scans Wall-E...moves on to the next probe... Stops -- Wait a minute. Turns back. Wall-E is gone. Gopher shrugs it off. Proceeds... Reaches Eve. Doesn't notice Wall-E hidden behind her. Gopher scans her BLINKING PLANT LIGHT --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The entire dock goes to "Code Green"!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alarms sound. Green lights flash. All automation stops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In rapid succession... ...A HOVER-TRANSPORT glides up to Gopher... ...A crane-bot loads Eve... ...Curved energy bands lock her down... ...Gopher assumes the driver's seat...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's all moving too fast for Wall-E. Suddenly Eve's transport heads for the ELEVATOR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ee-vah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E chases after them. Grabs onto the back of the transport. They disappear into the elevator.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cleaning crew files out. Follow their lines back to their hold. M-O stops short. Notices Wall-E's FILTHY TRACKS crossing his path.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reads: "FOREIGN CONTAMINANT"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The tracks lead to the elevator. M-O's neurosis takes over. Must clean dirt. He makes a radical decision and... ...jumps off his line. Starts methodically cleaning the dirt trail.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gopher waits patiently as the floors pass. Wall-E hidden behind the transport. Peeks at Eve. Pets her blank faceplate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (quiet beeps) [It'll be okay, Eve.]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ELEVATOR DOORS suddenly open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DOZENS OF ROBOTS speed along a multi-lane passageway. All following glowing lines on the floor. Wall-E's head whipsaws back and forth. Tries to process it all. Doesn't notice Gopher's transport merge into traffic... ...without him!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E shrinks from the high-speed traffic. Timidly attempts to merge. Sticks out one tread... -- Instantly causes a ROBOT PILE-UP. Wall-E boxes up. Guns it. Weaves across all the lines on the floor. Bounces off robots like bumper cars.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Barely able to navigate the chaos. Takes refuge in the middle of an INTERSECTION. Scans for Eve...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...a PAINT-BOT paints a wall sign... ...A GARBAGE-BOT dumps trash into a wall chute... ...Down the hall, Eve's transport glides up a ramp...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E chases after them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E flies up the ramp. Nearly collides with a merging HOVER CHAIR. It blocks his way. Wall-E gains alongside it, and discovers

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: sitting, reclined, in the chair. He is large, round and soft - like a big baby. Wears a red, BNL jumpsuit. The chair seems to be steering itself. Guided by floor lines, just like the robots. Speaker headrests block his peripheral vision. A HOLOGRAPHIC SCREEN floats inches in front of his face. He converses with a SECOND PASSENGER on screen:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, I've been in my cabin all morning so let's hover over to the driving range and hit a few virtual balls into space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nah, we did that yesterday. I don't want to do that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well then what do you want to do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks over his shoulder. Passenger #2 is floating right next to them. Isolated in his own hover chair. Also in a red jumpsuit. Also a big baby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know. Something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Both humans are totally unaware of the other's presence. They all exit the hallway. Merge into the...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E is in awe. Hundreds of floors of GUEST ROOMS rise on all sides. THOUSANDS OF PASSENGERS fill the giant space. All reclined and riding on hover chairs. MULTIPLE FLOOR LINES guide their chairs in all directions

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Humans have become the most extreme form of couch potatoe Absolutely no reason to ever get up. No purpose. Every one of them engrossed in their video screens. Cocooned in virtual worlds. Over-developed fingers tap ARMREST KEYPADS. The controls allow them to steer... ...order food... ...play games... ...and most of all...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...CHAT MINDLESSLY with other passengers:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The CHATTER is deafening. No one notices Wall-E at all. He drives into the endless human traffic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bot, over here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A DRINK-BOT floats over to a passenger. Puts a fresh drink in her open hand. Wall-E flows with the traffic into a LARGE TUNNEL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't hear you...I'm in a tunnel. You're breaking up...Oh, okay. You're back. I can hear you now...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They spill out into the BRIGHT LIGHT of the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A city-sized, mall-like environment. All under a GIANT DOME. The ceiling simulates the sun and sky. A BNL LOGO (w/ time & temp) appears on the FACE OF TH

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Buy N Large. Everything you need to be happy. Your day is very important to us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E is gobsmacked. A PASSENGER (JOHN) hovers up alongside him. Tries to hand off his empty drink cup to Wall-E.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, Drink-bot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E shies away. John reaches farther out with the cup.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here, take the cup. Take the cup -- Whoa!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reaches too far. John falls to the floor. Flails like an upside down turtle. Unable to stand on his baby legs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Instantly, SIRENS. Wall-E watches TWO STEWARDS arrive. Block John's accident. EMERGENCY LINES appear on the floor. Redirect the hover chair traffic. John reaches out for assistance. Nobody notices. Just drive past.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stewards? Hello? Uhh, help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please remain stationary. A service-bot will be here to assist you momentarily.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly John begins to rise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uhh...Hey! What's going on?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E lifting him up from behind. Loads him back onto his chair. John doesn't know how to react. Wall-E waves hello.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uhh... John.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ee-vah?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh no, John.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E scans the concourse. Spots Eve's transport about to board a MONORAIL. He races after them. Abandons the stunned John.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ee-vah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (small wave) Bye...Wall-E.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It pulls out of the station. Wall-E leaps on. Barely catches the last car. It glides down the concourse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A NANNY-BOT supervises a group of TODDLERS. All wearing matching BNL ONESIES. Motionless in their HOVER RINGS. They stare at educational programming on their holo-scree

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "A"! "A" is for "Axiom", your home sweet home. "B"! "B" is for "Buy N Large", your very best friend...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E's monorail glides past.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E takes in the overstimulating scenery. Dozens of THEMED FOOD RESTAURANTS whizz by. Each specialty is served in the same JUMBO PLASTIC CUP.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mmmmm! Time for lunch in a cup.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E now notices his fellow passengers. They all slurp from similar cups.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Next, the monorail passes a BEAUTY SALON. BEAUTICIAN-BOTS primp and style passengers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Feel beautiful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pre-recorded lines) ...It's the new you...Oh stunning...You look great...I know honey...Ahh. Men...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They pass through the FASHION DISTRICT. ENORMOUS BILLBOARDS hawk the latest color schemes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Attention, Axiom shoppers. Try blue! It's the new red!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oooohh...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Passengers next to Wall-E press their chair buttons. Their JUMPSUITS change from RED TO BLUE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Their monorail speeds into a glass tunnel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E looks past a PASSENGER (MARY) next to him. Spots Eve on the other side. Wall-E tries to sneak behind Mary. But her chair moves backwards. Smashes Wall-E against the back wall. No way getting past her. Wall-E politely tries to get Mary's attention. She's oblivious. Chats incessantly on her holo-screen:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Date?! (derisive snort) Don't get me started! Every holo-date I've been on has been a virtual disaster! If I could just meet one who wasn't so superficial. There are no good men out there!...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E tries to fold back her speaker headrest. Accidentally breaks it off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...I know! I know `cause I've scrolled through them all -- (Gasp) What the --?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mary's chair shorts out. ...holo-screen shuts off... ...jumpsuit defaults back to red... For the first time Mary has an unobstructed view. Her eyes slowly dilate. It's as if she's seeing the world for the first time...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (mesmerized) Huh... ?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her gaze falls on Wall-E. He waves politely.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beat) M-mary.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ee-vah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He points to Eve on the other side of Mary. Gestures he'd like to get by. She is slow to understand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huh? Oh, uh, sure go ahead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mary moves her hover chair back. Wall-E rolls over to Eve. Pats her protectively.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ee-vah...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The monorail emerges into "First Class." A vast, circular plaza of pools. Surrounded by a ring of high rise apartments. Hundreds of passengers lounge poolside. All serviced by their personal UMBRELLA-BOTS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (claps; umbrella-bot opens) Shade.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It stops at the BRIDGE PLAZA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The base of the Axiom's Bridge Tower. The passengers exit. Follow their respective lines. Gopher drives Eve (and Wall-E) towards the tower. Pass over a GIANT BNL LOGO on the plaza floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She is the last to exit the car. Doesn't follow any lines. Excited by her newfound awareness. Looks out on the Lido Deck as the monorail pulls away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't know we had a pool!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve's transport enters the cavernous hall. A lone TYPING-BOT is stationed at the far end. A bridge elevator behind him. Blocked by a force field gate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The transport pulls up to the typing-bot. Gopher BEEPS. The typing-bot responds by typing. Slowly. One...button...at...a...time...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finally, the gate lowers. Elevator doors open. The typing-bot watches the transport enter the elevator. Notices Wall-E hiding at the back. Wall-E gives it a FRIENDLY WAVE as the doors close. The elevator shoots up to the bridge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The typing-bot looks at its hand. Mimics Wall-E's waving gesture. Huh. Never done that before. Tries it some more...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E looks out on the descending Lido Deck. Marvels at it all. His view suddenly goes dark. The elevator doors open on...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The large circular room is dimly lit. Windows to SPACE on one side, a LIDO DECK view on the oth A massive console wraps around its entirety. Covered in buttons. A sea of thinking lights.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A CAPTAIN'S WHEEL automatically steers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gopher drives into the middle of the room. Beeps. Suddenly the wheel disengages. The autopilot (AUTO). A single camera eye lights up its center. A periscope stem connects Auto to the ceiling. Slides along rails up to Gopher, who salutes. Auto eyes Eve. Scans her. Wall-E sneaks back into the shadows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto detects Eve's plant light. Goes still... Begins computing rapidly. The number "A113" flashes on his lens. An ELECTRONIC EXCHANGE begins between Auto and Gopher.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E watches the interchange. Nervous. Without warning, Auto heads in his direction. Wall-E boxes up. A CIRCULAR SECTION OF FLOOR lights directly below him. Irises open, like a trapdoor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E drops...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and hits the floor hard in the room below. Someone stirs, then resumes SNORING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto lowers through the portal. A CLOCK ALARM BUZZER activates.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Captain. You are needed on the bridge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shoots back up. The portal closes. Wall-E peeks out of his box.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PAN across the nautical-themed cabin. One wall lined with PORTRAITS OF FORMER CAPTAINS. Their years of service listed below. The autopilot in the background of each picture. Each generation of Captain more devolved than the other. From human to gelatinous blob. We stop on the FINAL PORTRAIT. A blobby Captain. It looms above the actual CAPTAIN, snoring in bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He reaches out in his sleep to quiet the snooze alarm. Smacks Wall-E's box by mistake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Activates the POYSC SAMPLE. It plays loud. The Captain sits straight up, half-awake:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- All hands on deck!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E is frantic to turn off the music as... ...PREP ROBOTS burst from the cabinetry... ...a BEAUTICIAN-BOT, MASSAGE-BOT and WARDROBE-BOT... ...The Captain's bed automatically raises... ...Forms into a hover chair... The robots rapidly massage, brush, primp and dress him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pre-recorded) Morning! Just a trim?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E blends in with the primping. Uselessly wiggles the Captain's toes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Giggles)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lines light on the floor. Lead his chair automatically to the elevator. Wall-E sneaks aboard just as the doors close.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elevator doors swish open. The Captain still half-asleep. Claps his hands twice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On cue, a COFFEE MAKER rises from the console. Pours a cup. CLASSICAL MUSIC PLAYS on overhead speakers. The Captain's chair links with a LIT FLOOR PATH. Leads him over to the coffee. Wall-E stays lockstep behind him. Auto glides over to the Captain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coffee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E hides under the console just in time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain reaches for his coffee. Makes a minimal effort. Easier to adjust his chairback slowly forward... ...almost there...and...he grabs the coffee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, the annual --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain gives Auto the hand. Sips his coffee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Protocol, Auto. First things first. (to the room) Computer, status report.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His chair automatically arcs along the console. SPECIFIC PANELS light up as he passes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sips coffee)                   Unchanged...unchanged... Mechanical systems?...Reactor      unchanged...unchanged. core temperature?...Passenger      unchanged...unchanged. count?...Regenerative food         unchanged... buffet?...Jacuzzi Ph balance... Atmospheric conditions...laundry service volume...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He eyes Eve on the transport across the room. Has to get to her. But Auto is right above him. Can't move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Captain...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto calls up a screen on the console. Displays the recon-ship and a flashing positive probe. Waits patiently for the Captain to notice. Finally, the Captain turns...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, Auto.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, the annual reconnaissance has --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...but then notices the time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (disappointed sigh) Auto, why didn't you wake me for the morning announcements?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He slingshots his chair to the Lido Deck side of the brid Wall-E nearly collides with him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ducks back under the console.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Honestly, it's the one thing I get to do on this ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grabs a large dial. TIME OF DAY ICONS surround it. Cranks it from mid-day back to sunrise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - The FAKE NOON SUN reverses at high speed to a SUNRISE. - Passengers' LUNCH CUPS switch to BREAKFAST CUPS. - Poolside passengers' umbrella-bots close up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An ANNOUNCEMENT WHISTLE BLOWS over the intercom. A SECTION OF SKY DOME becomes a JUMBOTRON SCREEN. Displays a live video feed of the Captain. The image also shows up on every passenger's CHAIR SCREEN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (unmotivated) Well, good morning everybody, and welcome to day 255,642 aboard the Axiom. As always, weather's a balmy 72 degrees and sunny, and -- Oh, hey, I see the ship's log is showing that today is our 700th anniversary of our five year cruise. Well, I'm sure our forefathers would be proud to know that 700 years later we'd be... (deflates) ...doing the exact same thing...they were doing...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cut to VARIOUS ASPECTS OF AXIOM LIVING. The listening passengers look just as bored as the Captai

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (snaps out of ennui) SO! Be sure next mealtime to ask for your free... (hard to pronounce) ...septuacentennial cupcake -- in a cup. Also today we have, uh...uh...Hey, Auto, what's that flashing button? (mic feedback whine)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain stares at a FLASHING BUTTON on the console. It bears the same PLANT ICON as Eve's display.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Captain?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain turns to Auto. For the first time he notices Eve. Finally. Auto hovers over her. Salutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Probe One has returned positive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Positive?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto re-activates Eve. She wakes. Rises to salute the Captain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Across the room, Wall-E watches with sheer joy. She's okay! He is compelled to head straight for her...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But...no probe's ever come back positive... (looks at flashing button) ...before.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The flashing button is practically calling to him. Can't resist. Presses it. Instantly SHADES close on all the windows. The room goes dark.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Wall-E is forced to hide under the console again...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A LARGE HOLO-SCREEN appears right above him. Pre-recorded footage of the BNL CEO plays:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Greetings and congratulations, Captain! If you're seeing this, that means your Extraterrestrial Vegetation Evaluator, or... (air quotes) ..."EVE" probe, has returned from Earth with a confirmed specimen of ongoing photosynthesis!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain stares slack-jawed at the screen. Wall-E sneaks under the console towards Eve...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's right, it means it's time to go back home!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (nervous) Home? W-w-we're going back?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now that Earth has been restored to a life-sustaining status, by golly, we can begin "Operation Recolonize"!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A section of the console illuminates. An ancient, dusty MANUAL slides out...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...into a passing Wall-E's hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E immediately boxes up. Holds the manual over his head. The Captain mistakes Wall-E for a book podium. Grabs the manual. Blows dust off the cover. It reads: "OPERATION RECOLONIZE". Below the title, the same PLANT ICON from Eve's display.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Simply follow this manual's instructions to place the plant in your ship's holo- detector, and the -- (bad edit) -- Axiom -- will immediately navigate your return to Earth! It's that easy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An animated diagram depicts a stage below the ship's brid The symbol of a HOLO-DETECTOR rises up. A STICK FIGURE places a plant inside the machine. A STARLINER ICON flies back towards Earth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain listens closely to the instructions. Wall-E paying attention as well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huh?                               Huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E notices he has a clear shot to Eve. Heads in her direction.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now, due to the effects of micro-gravity, you and your passengers may have suffered some slight bone loss. But I'm sure a few laps around your ship's jogging track will get you back in shape in no time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain looks at his VESTIGIAL LEGS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have a jogging track?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you have any further questions just consult your operation manual. See you back home real soon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The transmission ends. The Captain examines the manual. Holds it out in front of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (reads; to himself) Operate... Manuel... (aloud; cautious) Manuel, relay instructions. Manuel?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto intervenes. Clips the corner of the cover with his handle... ...and simply opens the book. The Captain is both fascinated and intimidated. Lifts the cover with his own fingers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow... Will you look at that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E taps her shoulder. Not now Wall-E -- Double take!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (tiny wave) Ee-vah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve is in a state of disbelief. Shoves Wall-E into the shadows under the console.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (hushed; angry) [Wall-E, what are you doing here?! You can't be here! You're going to get me in trouble!...]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Makes a flurry of clandestine gestures at him. Wall-E just stares at her. Smitten.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (swoons) Ee-vah...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He manages to turn to the FIRST PAGE OF INSTRUCTIONS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (reads aloud) Well, let's open her up. Step One. Voice command, "Confirm Acquisition."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Confirm Acquisition.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The bridge suddenly jumps to life. Green lights flash. A LARGE DEVICE appears from the ceiling... ...Scans the entire room... ...Identifies Eve... ...Rides along the ceiling rails... ...Stations itself directly above Eve... ...Arms unfold. Position her... ...A VOICE ARM swings into the Captain's face:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Voice authorization required.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Accepted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A BUTTON-PUSHING ARM lowers. Presses a sequence of buttons on Eve... Her chest lights up. The doors open. The Captain winces...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and nothing is inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's the thingie?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plant. Right. Right. Where is it? (checks manual) Maybe we missed a step. Show me how you change the text again...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto and the Captain turn away. Re-read the manual. Eve is stunned. Searches her chest cavity for the plant. Then she remembers...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plant! Wall-E... (turns on him) Wall-E!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E flinches. Surprised by her anger. Eve opens Wall-E's chest. Empty. Picks him up. Scans the floor. Nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ee-vah?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (angry electronics) [Find it!] PLANT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E scared of her. Starts searching.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why don't you scan her to be sure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve jumps back to attention. Auto slides up to her. Scans her chest cavity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Contains no specimen. Probe's memory is faulty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, then...we're NOT going to Earth?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shakes his wheel) Negative.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, uh, I guess things go back to normal, huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Correct, Captain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (privately relieved) Well, false alarm!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: False alarm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Instantly the plant retrieval device retracts. Exits back into the ceiling. The shades rise. Lights go back on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The probe must be defective. Gopher, send her to the Repair Ward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve turns. Excuse me? Gopher hops to attention. Traps Eve in his SUSPENSION BEAM. Loads her back onto the transport...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have them run diagnostics on her. Make sure she's not malfunctioning -- EEYAH!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and reveals WALL-E. Everyone stares at him. Long awkward pause. Wall-E innocently motors over to the Captain. Shakes his hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leaves a CLUMP OF DIRT in his palm. The Captain stares at it. Turns to Auto.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have "Wall-E" cleaned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The elevator opens. Gopher's transport drives out. Both Eve and Wall-E strapped on it with energy bands. The typing-bot has now mastered waving. Waves an enthusiastic goodbye. Wall-E tries to get Eve's attention.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ee-vah?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She gives him the cold shoulder. Refuses to speak to him. Wall-E shrinks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The transport exits the lobby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Analyze.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The CLUMP OF DIRT is suspended in a beam of light. It rotates. The captain sits at his vanity console. ANALYSIS DATA scrolls on a HOLO-SCREEN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Analysis: foreign contaminant. Substance is a three phase system composed of various combinations of naturally derived solids. Subject is most commonly referred to as "soil", "dirt", or "earth".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The last word piques his interest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Earth?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His eyes drift to a GLOBE on his shelf.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Define "Earth"...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Earth" - the surface of the world as distinct from the sky or sea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dozens of IMAGES OF LAND pop up on screen. Lush, green, colorful, inviting. He's fascinated. Takes it all in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow... Define "sea".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THROUGH THE WINDOW we see the Captain. Glued to his screen. Filled with ocean images.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...an expanse of salt water that covers most of the Earth's surface and surrounds its land masses...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The CAMERA DRIFTS AWAY from the window... ...Moves aft to the Axiom's stern... ...Pushes in...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: M-O continues to clean WALL-E'S FILTHY TRAIL. Oblivious to everything around him. Cuts through traffic. Robots crash into each other in his wake. M-O doesn't notice EVE AND WALL-E'S TRANSPORT drive past. They hover down a corridor, and enter...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a fully automated clinic for broken bots. Day care for the malfunctioned. The REJECTS are kept in FORCE FIELD PENS. Dozens line the walls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve and Wall-E stop at the INSPECTION STATION. Robotic ORDERLY-ARMS activate. Wall-E shrinks. Watches them systematically check in Eve. Perform an I.D. scan. Attach a RED "DEFECT" BOOT to her head. A button is pressed on the boot. Eve goes into "sleep" mode. Lifted off the transport.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beeps) [Where are you going?!]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The orderly-arms now start on Wall-E. He escapes before they can place a defect boot on him. Races through the ward. Wall-E runs smack into a defective BEAUTICIAN-BOT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pre-recorded) Just a trim? Uh huh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She paints Wall-E's face with hideous looking make-up. Holds up a mirror. Wall-E gasps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You look gorgeous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E is snatched up by an orderly-arm. Placed in an empty force field pen. Sits between a PAINT-BOT and VACU-BOT: ...The broken paint-bot flings paint at Wall-E... ...The vacu-bot sneezes dust in his face... Across the way a MASSAGE-BOT flails wildly. Orderly-arms restrain him with an ENERGY STRAIGHTJACKET.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve slides past Wall-E. Carried by an orderly-arm. Brought into the "DIAGNOSTICS" ROOM. The frosted glass doors shut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ee-vah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Orderly-arms run diagnostics on a few reject robots:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - An UMBRELLA-BOT flips open and overextends. The orderly-arms struggle to close it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - A DEFIBRILLATOR-BOT shocks a CRASH-TEST-DUMMY. It bursts into flames.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve is awoken from "sleep" mode. A series of tests begin. Eve is annoyed but calm. It's all routine. An orderly-arm easily detaches her gun arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E stares at the frosted glass doors. Can only make out EVE'S SILHOUETTE. To him, her arm is being ripped off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ee-vah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The orderly-arm tests Eve's circuitry. Her insides light up. It tickles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Giggles)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Next to her the UMBRELLA-BOT's mechanism SCREECHES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E watches in horror. It looks as if Eve is being tortured. Mistakes the screeching for her screams. Wall-E struggles to free himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She is washed and scrubbed. A CIRCULAR BUFFER cleans between her head and body. It feels good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It looks as if Eve is being beheaded. He needs to stop the torture. Wall-E fires his CUTTING LASER at his pen's force field. The barrier shorts out. Wall-E tumbles to the floor. Lands on his "Play" button. POYSC blares across the ward. The Rejects all stop and stare.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EEEEEEVAAAAHH!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E races to the diagnostics room. Crashes right through the glass doors. Finds Eve surrounded by orderly-arms. Grabs Eve's separated gun arm. Points it at the orderly-arms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (angry beeps) [Let her go, or I'll shoot!]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His hands tremble, Don Knotts-style. Doesn't realize...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...he's holding the gun backwards.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve slowly reaches for the weapon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ("Put the gun down...") Wall-E...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An orderly lunges at him. Wall-E panics. Shoots! The gun fires backwards. It blasts through the repair ward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blows up the REPAIR WARD CONTROL PANEL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E shrinks. He knows he's in trouble.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The smoking remains of the control panel SHORT CIRCUIT. ...All orderly-arms go limp... ...The repair ward doors open up... ...and all FORCE FIELDS disappear...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Rejects look at each other for a beat. Then CHEER wildly. We're free!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The mob of robots all rush Wall-E. Lift him on their shoulders. Carry their hero out of the ward. Wall-E still holding on to Eve's gun arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve watches in astonishment. This day just gets worse and worse. She flies off after them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The rejects march Wall-E out the entrance. Their RED "DEFECT" BOOTS all blink. Activate a WARNING LIGHT above the doorway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EMERGENCY LIGHTS blinking. Activate an embedded ROW OF STEWARDS. They pop out of the wall. Race to the repair ward. Sirens wailing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The REJECT MOB stampedes through the halls. Disrupts all robot traffic. Wall-E carried over their heads. Suddenly, the mob stops in front of...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...a BLOCKADE OF STEWARDS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Halt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E's dropped in front of them. Still holds Eve's gun. Cowers. A TINY ROBOT pushes Wall-E closer. Show `em who's boss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (stern) Wall-E!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve catches up to them. Flies over to Wall-E. Snatches her arm back. Just as she reattaches her gun...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...The steward CAMERA EYES take a snapshot of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alarms sound. SCREENS appear, displaying EVE AND WALL-E'S IMAGE. She appears to brandish her gun at camera. Like Bonnie and Clyde. Their faces now on every wall... ...passenger's hover chair... ...cabin... ...hallway...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Caution: Rogue robots...Caution: Rogue robots...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The stewards prepare to fire SUSPENSION BEAMS (like Gophe Eve realizes what's about to happen. Grabs Wall-E. Flies over the stewards.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Halt. Halt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The mass of rejects take their cue. Robot rebellion! They bust through the steward blockade.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Robots recognize Eve and Wall-E as they fly past.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Match them with the "Wanted" screens. Call attention to them. Point. Stewards in hot pursuit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve hides herself and Wall-E in a PORTHOLE CUBBY. Lets the stewards pass by. She glances out the porthole...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She can see the DOCKING BAY below her. Just under the bay doors...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...a row of EMERGENCY ESCAPE PODS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve gets an idea. Grabs Wall-E and flies down the hallway...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve and Wall-E ride in uncomfortable silence. Their "WANTED" IMAGE plays on an elevator screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Caution: Rogue robots.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E points to it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beeps) [Hey look! We're on TV -- !]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve aims her gun at the screen. Blows it to pieces. Wall-E shrinks into a box. Never mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dark. The elevator chimes. Eve and Wall-E step out. Rows of NUMBERED BAY DOORS line the hallway. Eve approaches "Bay #1". She and Wall-E enter...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve navigates the dark. Approaches a freestanding CONSOLE. Fiddles with some buttons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He glances down at EVE'S HAND. Privately intertwines his fingers. Maybe now is the right moment...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (quiet) Ee-vah...?

dialogues.speaker: FLASH
dialogues.text: Banks of controls light up around them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: is revealed at the end of the room. Its hatch automatically opens. Bathes the room with light from its lit interior. Eve turns to Wall-E:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Earth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She points to an OVERHEAD SCREEN. It displays coordinates to Earth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Earth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She gestures for Wall-E to enter the pod. He happily complies. Jumps up on one of the seats. Pats the seat next to him. Aren't you coming?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve remains at the threshold. Shakes her head. Points to her chest. Makes her PLANT SYMBOL glow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Directive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...She's not going.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This changes everything. Wall-E races out of the pod. Boxes up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beeps) [Then I'm not going either.]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve shakes her head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (gentle, but firm) Wall-E.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carries his box back into the pod. Exits. Wall-E follows her right back out. Drives behind the console. You can't make me. Eve sighs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (frustrated) Wall-E.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hallway elevator CHIMES. They both look up. Someone is coming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve shuts off everything. Lights go out. The pod closes back up. Both Eve and Wall-E hug the wall. Blend in with the other wall fixtures.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They HEAR something hover into the     room. Can't see what it is. Then... An EPAULET ROBOT ARM rises up over     the console. Presses buttons. The pod lights up again. The hatch     opens. The stranger's SHADOW comes around     the console to rev

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve and Wall-E look at each other. Gopher? They watch from the shadows as... ...Gopher enters the pod... ...opens his chest cavity... ...emits his suspension beam...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and deposits the PLANT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (excited whisper) Plant!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gopher exits the pod.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She keeps her eyes on Gopher. Watches him return to the console. She turns to speak to Wall-E --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whisper) Wall-E?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E is inside the pod. Picks up the plant. Proudly shows it to Eve.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (loud whisper) Ee-vah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (louder whisper) Wall-E!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Too late. Gopher hits a button. The pod door shuts on Wall-E...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and launches into space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gopher shuts off the room. Exits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve leaps out of the shadows. Looks out the POD BAY WINDOW. Wall-E's pod rapidly shrinking in the distance. The plant icon on Eve's chest glows. She rushes to a narrow SERVICE AIRLOCK. Enters it like a phone booth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve bursts out into space. Rockets after Wall-E.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E plastered against the back of the pod. It suddenly reduces speed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cruising speed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He drops to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are now free to move around the cabin.
