dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E fumbles to get his bearings. Peers out the rear hatch window. Sees the Axiom receding from view.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beeps) [Yikes!]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He clambers up into the pilot's seat. Pulls back hard on the throttle. Nothing happens. Looks down at the console. A SELF-DESTRUCT DIAL is counting down:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Twenty seconds till self-destruct...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh oh. Wall-E frantically hits the SELF-DESTRUCT button. No change. Pushes every button on the console. Everything activates: ...Lights flash... ...Oxygen masks drop...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Windshield wipers activate... ...Flares fire off... ...Parachutes deploy...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ten seconds till self-destruct...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E panics. Looks for a means of escape. Spots the hatch. Grabs the pod's FIRE EXTINGUISHER. Shoots himself to the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ten, nine, eight, seven, six, five, four, three, two...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pulls on the EMERGENCY EXIT LEVER. The hatch won't open!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She races through space after him. Suddenly, in the distance, the POD EXPLODES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve is gut-punched.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, no, no...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She flies towards the debris field, when --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E whizzes right past her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ee-vaaaaaah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He holds the FIRE EXTINGUISHER. Uses it as a form of propulsion. Eve is consumed with relief. Chases after him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He points the extinguisher the other way. Attempts to fly back over to her. It's hard to steer...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...They rocket right past each other again...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beeps) [Stay there! I'll come to you!]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve waits. Wall-E finally has the hang of steering. Fires short bursts. Very slowly...makes his way...to Eve. Gets extinguisher foam in her face. She giggles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ("Look what I've got") Ee-vah...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He opens his compactor door. Pulls out the PLANT, still in the boot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Gasp!)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Sensors zero in on the plant... ...Confirm its authenticity... ...A MAP OF THE AXIOM appears... ...Draws directions to the bridge... ...A command flashes: "DELIVER TO AXIOM SUPERIOR"...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve is ecstatic. She snaps the plant up with her tractor beam. Seals it safely in her chest. Then scoops up Wall-E in her arms. Spins him around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E! (Laughs)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E can't believe his luck. Rests his head on her shoulder. Bliss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve stops spinning. Leans her head against his. A tiny ARC OF ELECTRICITY passes between them. A "thank you" kiss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E's METER spikes. He floats circles in space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (swoons)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (hums) [Come on. Time's a wastin'.]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She reaches for his hand. Wall-E shakes his head. Holds up his extinguisher instead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beeps) [I can fly myself.]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kicks on the extinguisher. Spins in a pirouette... ...and flies away. Eve giggles. Chases after him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two fly around the stern of the ship. Wall-E does a few barrel rolls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beeps) [Try that.]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve giggles. Matches him move for move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pair fly between the BOOSTER ENGINES of the ship. Weave in and out of the rocket flames. Bank up along the ship's port side. Execute a double helix in perfect unison...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Passengers hover down the hallway. All focused on their private screens. No one looks out at the stars.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...except for MARY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She has pulled over to the side. Stares wistfully out the DECK WINDOW.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sigh) So many stars.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Spots EVE & WALL-E dancing among the stars.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oooh... (recognizes Wall-E) Hey, that's what's his name --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She backs up to wave hello. Bumps into JOHN'S HOVER CHAIR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! What the --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mary leans over to his armrest. Turns off his holo-screen. Points out the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look! Look at THAT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (disoriented) Wha...huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E flies past the window. A wave of recognition hits John. He comes to life, as if wakened from a long sleep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey... I know that guy! It's, uh... (snaps fingers) Wall-E! Hey Wall-E! It's your buddy, John!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right, Wall-E! Hi Wall-E!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They both wave until Wall-E's out of sight. John absentmindedly lowers his hand to his armrest...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and touches Mary's hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Both turn towards each other. They make eye contact for the first time. Awkward beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They soar across the Axiom's bow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto busy operating the ship. Doesn't see Eve and Wall-E outside the window. Auto turns the SKY DIAL from DAY TO NIGHT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sky dome fast-forwards to evening. PAN OVER to the top of the bridge tower. The windows of the Captain's quarters are dark. Only the FLICKERING GLOW OF A HOLO-SCREEN lights the room

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Define "hoe-down".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain is still engrossed in his Earth research. MULTIPLE IMAGES litter the screen. Crops, farms, a barn, etc.... An IMAGE OF PEOPLE SQUARE DANCING pops up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Hoedown" - a social gathering at which lively dancing would take place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An aperture opens in the ceiling above. Auto lowers down to face the Captain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto! Earth is amazing! (points to images) These are called "farms". Humans would put seeds in the ground, pour water on them, and they'd grow food, like, pizza --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto shuts off the holo-screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good night, Captain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (annoyed grunt)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto rises back up to the bridge. The aperture shuts. Lights out. The Captain glares at the ceiling. Then whispers conspiratorially to the computer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Psst! Computer. (the holo-screen lights up) Define "dancing".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve and Wall-E descend along the starboard side. Spiral gracefully around one another.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Dancing" - A series of movements, involving two partners, where speed and rhythm match harmoniously with music.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E's extinguisher runs out of foam. He lets it float freely out into space. Eve catches him in her arms. Wall-E croons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve scans the Axiom for a way in. Notices SPARKS. Down on the ship's lower hull...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A REPAIR-BOT (BURN-E) welds an antenna. Eve and Wall-E fly into the open hatch behind him. It shuts. Burn-e bangs on the closed door. Stuck outside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beeps) [Hey! Let me in! Let me in!] (looks around) [Crap.]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Lido Deck is now closing...The Lido Deck is now closing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The last few passengers exit the pool area. All wearing the same color blue uniforms...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...except TWO RED ONES still in the pool.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They ripple the surface of the pool. John and Mary float over the water's surface. Splash one another playfully.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey now. Stop that...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Make me (giggles).

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't know we had a pool.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A LIFEGUARD-BOT (glorified megaphone) lowers from its tow Reprimands them from the pool's edge:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No splashing, no diving.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JOHN & MARY (annoyed) Ahh! Go on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John splashes the robot. It shorts out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve and Wall-E sneak onto the deck. Hide between a ROW OF TOWEL CARTS. Eve peeks through the towels. Surprised to discover TWO STEWARDS. On duty in front of the bridge lobby entrance. No way in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A TRASH-BOT passes. Dumps its load down a nearby TRASH CHUTE. Eve keys in on the chute. It runs all the way up the tower...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...to the bridge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He stares at EVE'S HAND. Time to seize the moment. Hits the PLAY BUTTON on his chest. It Only Takes a Moment plays from his scratchy speaker. Puts his hands together...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve whips around. What's that noise?! Wall-E holds his hands up to Eve...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: E-vah --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve immediately shuts off his music. Shoves his hands down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (hushed hums) [Stop it! They'll hear us!]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She places a stack of towels on his head. Gestures for Wall-E to stay put. Points to her PLANT LIGHT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Directive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Before Wall-E can even protest she is gone. Zooms silently across the Lido Deck. Up into the trash chute.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It sits in space. The AXIOM glides towards it. Something's not right. We reveal the CAPTAIN'S FINGERS holding the ship...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain sits by his window to space. Holds a toy AXIOM MODEL over his GLOBE OF EARTH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: [Rocket noises] Prepare for landing... [Landing noises] We're here everybody! Yeah, Captain! [crowd cheers] Captain we're home! It's so beautiful! [crowd cheers]...No it's nothing. I was pleased to do it. It's all about you people --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NOISES. Eve bursts out from it, like an angel. Blows the lid off. The Captain is stunned by this vision. She opens her chest to reveal...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...the plant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (amazed) How...? How'd you find it?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve hovers over to him. Salutes. Formally presents him the plant. He takes it in his hands. Still potted in the old boot. Gazes at it in wonder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can go back home...for the first time! (laughs) What's it like now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve shrugs. Doesn't know how to answer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, no! Don't tell me! I want to see for myself!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns to his console. Hits a button. A CYLINDRICAL DEVICE rises from a panel. The Captain sticks it to the side of Eve's head. A HOLOGRAPHIC SCREEN projects from the device. Plays back images of her time on Earth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A COLLAGE OF IMAGES rapidly scroll past. All displayed from Eve's POV: ...Being delivered to Earth... ...Flying above the devastated landscape... ...Blowing up a rock... ...Scans of numerous trash locations...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait...that doesn't look like Earth... Where's the blue sky...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks over to his computer screen. The BEAUTY IMAGES OF EARTH still on display. Compares them with what plays on Eve's screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Where's the grass?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His face drops. Slumps in defeat. The dream is over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The HELLO DOLLY clip of POYSC plays... It stirs the Captain out of his funk. He looks up at the screen. Leans in for a closer look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...I know that song... (observes the dancers' feet) And they're... dancing. Yes, dancing!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A rueful smile grows on his face. He looks down at

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's tapping in time to the music. His gaze drifts over to the plant in his hands. He lifts it up. Makes the boot dance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...You made it somehow, eh little guy? You didn't give up, did you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As if in response, the plant wilts slightly. A leaf drops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Gasp!) Oh no, no -- (remembers) Wait a minute.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain urgently hovers across the room. Eve left alone. Her recorded memories continue playing...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...The clip changes to It Only Takes a Moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve recognizes the music. Watches the lovers on screen hold hands. Something familiar about the gesture... Looks at her own hands. Slowly, she interlocks her fingers... ...Eve's eyes go wide. This is what Wall-E was trying to say to her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her memories continue on the screen: ...a tap on the shoulder... ...Wall-E presents her the plant -- ...The screen goes BLACK!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...SECURITY CAMERA FOOTAGE initiates.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E's vigil for Eve plays out: ...protecting her from the rain... ...the sun...the sandstorm... ...keeping watch night and day... ...trying to jump start her heart...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Amazed at Wall-E's selfless dedication to her. Realizes the meaning of Wall-E's love.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (soft) Wall-E...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks at her hands again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Still waiting between the towel racks. Rehearses holding out his hand to Eve.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ee-vah... Ee-VAH...? EEE-vah... (gives up; beeps) [I'll never get it right.]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Becomes impatient. Sneaks his way over to the GARBAGE CHUTE. Sticks his head in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No answer. The chute has an endless drop. Wall-E climbs in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holds himself spread eagle to stay in place. Carefully inches his way up to the Captain's quarters...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A monorail pulls up. M-O steps off. Still hot on Wall-E's trail. Scrubs the dirty tracks towards the bridge lobby. Then notices Wall-E's FRESH TRACKS...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...leading to the trash chute.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beeps) [Ah-hah! Gotcha!]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain at his wet bar. Waters the plant in the sink.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There you go little guy. You came a long way for a drink of water... Just needed someone to look after you, that's all --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He is struck with a notion. Stares out the window at space for a beat. Sees HIS REFLECTION holding the plant. Glances at his EARTH GLOBE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to himself) We have to go back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Activates his chair's call button.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto, come down here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aye-aye, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve is still watching Wall-E's vigil on the screen: ...playing Pong... ...Wall-E etches their names in a heart... Eve is lost in the moments. So touched.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smitten) Wall-E...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (remembers) Wall-E!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's still waiting for her. She turns to leave and finds

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: lowering in front of her. Auto spots the plant in the Captain's hand. "A113" flashes on Auto's lens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto, Eve found the plant. Fire up the Holo-detector.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not necessary, Captain. You may give it to me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (not listening) You know what? I should do it myself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heads for the elevator.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Captain!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto shoots back upstairs. Pops out another APERTURE in front of the elevator. Blocks the Captain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, I insist you give me the plant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto, get out of my way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, we cannot go home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you talking about? Why not?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That is classified. Captain, give me the plant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (holds plant out of reach) What do you mean, "classified"? You don't keep secrets from the Captain!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give me the plant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell me what's classified!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The plant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell me, Auto! That's an order!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a stare down. Beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aye-aye, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto rises back into the ceiling. Lowers down over the vanity console. High speed button pushing. A NEW BNL VIDEO MESSAGE appears. Labeled: "TOP SECRET: FOR AUTOPILOT EYE ONLY". The BNL FANFARE plays. Cut to the BNL CEO at the podium. Haggard. Nervous. Wears an emergency oxygen vest. The fanfare plays too long.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to O.S.) Just cut it off, will ya?! (music stops; forced chuckle) Hey there, Autopilots! Uh, got some bad news. Operation Cleanup has, uh, well... failed! Wouldn't you know, rising toxicity levels have made life unsustainable on Earth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unsustainable? What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Darn it all, we're going to have to cancel Operation Recolonize. (dons his life vest) So just, uh...just stay the course. Rather than try to fix this problem, it'll just be easier if everyone remains in space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (offended) Easier?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. President, sir, it's time to go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright, uh...uh...I'm giving override directive: "A113". Go to full autopilot. Take control of everything! And do not return to Earth! (ready to run) Repeat! Do not return to Earth! (throws on his gas mask; to camera crew) Now let's get the heck out of here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The CEO races out of the room. The message cuts out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto turns to face the Captain. The Captain shakes his head in disgust.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now, the plant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, wait a minute. Computer, when was that message sent to the Axiom?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The paused image on the holo-screen highlights. Data begins to calculate on the screen. We see YEARS SCROLL RAPIDLY BACKWARDS. It stops on "2110".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Message received in the year 2110.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's -- that's nearly 700 years ago!! Auto, things have changed! We've got to go back!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, orders are: "Do not return to Earth".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But life is sustainable now! Look at this plant, green and growing! It's living proof he was wrong.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Irrelevant, Captain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?! It's completely relevant! (points out to space) Out there is our home! Home, Auto! And it's in trouble! I can't just sit here and...and...do nothing! That's all I've done! That's all anyone on this blasted ship has ever done...NOTHING!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the Axiom you will survive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Must follow my directive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain turns away in frustration. His eyes catch sight of the CAPTAIN PORTRAITS. Notices AUTO in every one of them. Looking over all their shoulders. A little closer every generation. The Captain slowly looks over his shoulder... ...and Auto is right behind him. The Captain looks at the plant in his lap. His countenance grows determined. He rights his hat... ...turns to face Auto... ...and gives the most authoritative order of his career:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm the Captain of the Axiom. We are going home today!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto slides into his face. Makes the Captain flinch. No more Mr. Nice Robot. Auto emits an ELECTRONIC COMMAND.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: shoots out of a pneumatic tube. Salutes Auto. Eve immediately remembers him from the Pod Bay. She BEEPS a warning to the Captain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gopher?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gopher activates his suspension beam.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatches the plant away from the Captain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! That's my plant. This is mutiny! (to Eve) Eve, arrest him!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve draws her GUN ARM. Points it at Gopher. The robot raises his epaulet arms. Don't shoot! She opens her chest cavity. Motions for Gopher to put the plant inside her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve, you are to put this plant straight in the Holo-detector.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gopher slowly advances towards Eve. But then tosses the plant across the room...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...down the TRASH CHUTE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (hums) [Oh no!]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's over. The plant is gone. But in that frozen moment...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...THE PLANT suddenly reappears. Rises like a ghost, up from the chute. Wall-E's head follows. Unawares of the plant resting on his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ee-vah?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WALL-E!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E straddles the top of the lip chute. The plant drops onto his chest. Wall-E looks at it with surprise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beeps) [Hey, the plant.]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CAPTAIN & EVE Wall-E! The plant!...[Toss it! Over here!]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E is slow to understand. Finally picks up the plant. Anticipates to throw it, when... ...Auto lowers right in front of him, trying to block.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give me the plant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve moves to help Wall-E. But Gopher traps her in his suspension beam.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E dodges Auto's multi-arm advances. Defiantly tosses the plant into his chest. Slams it shut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beeps) [You can't have it!]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto flips open one of his handles. Produces a TASER...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and ELECTROCUTES Wall-E.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E's chest circuitry blows out. He wheezes... ...then drops lifelessly down the chute.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve screams. Gopher floats her trapped form over to Auto. The button on her DEFECT BOOT is pressed. She shuts down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gopher's ray holds Eve over the opening. Drops her down the chute. She bangs against the sides as she tumbles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gopher salutes Auto and exits. Auto turns to the Captain. He is in shock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All communications are terminated. You are confined to quarters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The power shuts off in the room. Auto rises back up through the ceiling...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain looks up. Shakes his fist in fury.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The aperture closes TO BLACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Black. The word "REBOOT" suddenly flashes. Her view comes into focus. Scans around. Disoriented.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve lies in a seemingly endless WAREHOUSE OF TRASH. Trash, slime, and robot parts everywhere. Piles dumped from a variety of CEILING CHUTES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve looks down. COMPUTER MICE crawl over her. One of them has crawled over her REBOOT button. Switched her back on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A warning alarm sounds. Eve spots a PLATFORM, loaded with GIANT TRASH CUBES. It slides into an AIRLOCK. Inner shield doors lock and seal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Caution: Activating airlock disposal...Activating airlock disposal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The exterior hatch flies open. The vacuum of space instantly sucks out the cubed trash.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve begins to panic. Calls out again:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, her area is flooded in light. She flinches at the sight of

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as they rumble up behind her. Headlights for eyes. They bear a slight resemblance to Wall-E. "WALL-A" emblazoned on their fronts. Each grab a ton of trash at once. Eve is swept up with the junk. Compact it. Spit it out...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Eve now trapped in the side of a giant cube.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her cube is picked up. Transported to a waiting platform. Stacked with other massive cubes. Eve discovers...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Wall-E trapped in the cube next to her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He groans. Not doing well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Again the alarms kick in. The platform slides on rails... ...across the safety line... ...into the airlock... ...the inner shield doors begin to close...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve needs to act fast. Her gun arm stuck inside the cube. Struggles to activate it... ...It cocks. BLASTS herself free. Flies over to Wall-E. He's stuck deep in the cube...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: M-O suddenly drops from a ceiling chute. Lands in a pile of trash. Covered with filth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: [Primal scream.]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Piles of trash everywhere. The airlock doors closing in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ZOOMS IN and locks on Wall-E. His screen reads: "FOREIGN CONTAMINANT".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beeps) [I have you now!]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: M-O speeds towards the airlock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tugs on Wall-E. Desperate to free him. He's slow to pull loose...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...THE GAP in the doors narrows...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Eve's never going to make it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Racing towards the doors. He's almost at the airlock... The doors SLAM tight against his roller arms. M-O is stuck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The exterior hatch opens: ...Eve yanks Wall-E free... ...The trash flies out into space... ...She flies against the force... ...Fights to reach M-O... ...Grabs onto his roller...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The WALL-As notice M-O stuck in the door. Slam the EMERGENCY SHUT-OFF BUTTON for the airlock. The exterior hatch closes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve and Wall-E fall to the ground in a heap. Safe. M-O still stuck in the door. Shaking uncontrollably with fear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The WALL-As light up a SMALL WORK SPACE. Eve props Wall-E up against some trash. He's barely functioning. Fades in and out of consciousness. Just his red "warning" light flashes on his meter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ("Stay awake.") Wall-E...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve gently opens his chest cavity. Examines the damage. Carefully pulls out his CIRCUIT BOARD. Charred. Shorting out. Irreparable. She flies off into the depot. Searches for a new circuit board.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: M-O dutifully cleaning Wall-E. Finishes up. His DISPLAY POV reads: "All clean." M-O closes up. Satisfied. Wall-E feebly offers his hand in gratitude.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (weak) Wall-E.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: M-O stares at the filthy hand. Cleans it. Then shakes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They sit in awkward silence for a beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Really?)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Got it.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve returns with FOUND CIRCUIT BOARDS. Shows each one to Wall-E. Will any of these work? He shakes his head with a frail "no."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E opens his compactor. Pulls out the plant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (weak) Di...rec...tive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve holds the plant. Her "RETURN TO AXIOM SUPERIOR" flashes in her display. She considers it for a moment... ...then tosses the plant to the floor. I don't care about the plant anymore. She holds her hand out to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Directive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E struggles to lift his hand to Eve's. He reaches out...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and bats her hand away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Surprises Eve. Wall-E pushes past her. Crawls over to the discarded plant. Gives it back to Eve.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (weak) Errr.....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve can't make out what he is saying. Wall-E fumbles around his box. Pulls out... ...the Zippo lighter. Lights it. Eve stares at the flame.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Earth?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Earth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He moves his binocular   eyes up and down. Like the time he fixed   his broken eye. You can fix me, Eve. With spare parts in my   truck. The truck that is back   on...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Earth! Earth!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her eyes light up. She understands! No time to lose. She scoops him up...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: M-O?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ("I'm comin'!") Wall-E!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: M-O rushes over to Wall-E. Hangs onto his IGLOO LATCH with his roller. Eve raises her gun arm... ...Blasts a HOLE IN THE CEILING. Takes off with the two of them. Up through the garbage chute. The WALL-As wave goodbye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A steward moves down the hall. Siren wailing. Scans for rogue robots. Eve and Wall-E's "Warning" image on his display screen. He stops in front of...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: painted haphazardly on the floor. Follows it to a STORAGE CLOSET door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wrong.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The steward opens the closet. Inside, a PAINT-BOT hides his head in the corner. The yellow line leads straight to his rear brush. The Steward apprehends him with his SUSPENSION BEAM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, everything begins to shake. The steward looks around, confused. A JET ENGINE NOISE builds. Seems to be coming from...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...the hallway TRASH CHUTE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve, Wall-E & M-O burst out from it. The paint-bot recognizes Wall-E. Beeps the POYSC song. Our savior has arrived! The steward's alarm goes haywire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He takes a snapshot: Eve, holding Wall-E, holding the plant...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and Eve is aiming her gun straight at camera.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The terrified steward is thrown in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please hold. We are currently having technical difficul -- !

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve locks the door on him. The trio take off down the hall. The freed paint-bot gives chase. Cheers POYSC as he follows. Wall-E, only half-functioning, gets an idea. Presses his PLAY BUTTON. POYSC BLARES through the hallway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REJECTS come out of hiding as they hear the music. Parade after Eve and Wall-E. Hum POYSC. All following the pied piper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve and Wall-E's "Wanted" image instantly circulates. Alarms sound. Alert screens pop up around the sleeping ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Caution: Rogue robots...Caution: Rogue robots...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto observes the same "Wanted" image.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not possible.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raises a screen showing a DECK PLAN OF THE AXIOM. It highlights Eve and Wall-E's location. Auto activates every steward on the Axiom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stewards eject from their wall stations. Like ATMs jumping to life. Race in the direction of Eve. Carelessly knock over stray passengers in their way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Caution: Rogue Robots...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto watches the deck plan display. Monitors the progress of all the stewards. The CAMERA DROPS THROUGH THE FLOOR, down to...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain, still trapped. Rams his hover chair against the locked elevator door. Has no effect.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (hoarse; exhausted) Mutinyyy...Mute...neee...This is your last chance...Auto...You hear me?...Stupid...wheel...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Caution: Rogue robots...Caution: Rogue robots...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A flashing light catches his attention. Outside his window. He looks up on the SKY DOME... A GIANT "WANTED" IMAGE of Eve and Wall-E, holding...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The plant!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain's eyes light up. Glances down at the OPEN MANUAL on the floor. "Plant icon + Holo-detector icon = Earth" He is filled with renewed determination.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Laughs) We'll see who's powerless now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lays flat in his chair. Floats under his VANITY CONSOLE like a grease monkey. Pulls off the underside panel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah-Ha!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yanks out a bundle of wiring. Cross-connects two wires. The console powers up...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve zooms through the hallways. A BAND OF REJECTS track behind them. They reach an intersection when...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...The CAPTAIN'S FACE appears on holo-screens all around them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Testing, testing... Is this thing on?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All screens display the Captain's live feed. He's absolutely everywhere. A few stray passengers are still up. Watch their screens in confusion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto watches the Captain on the holo-screen. Furiously tries to shut off the intercom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Psssst! Hey! Hey! This is the Captain I'm locked in my room. Eve, Wall-E, bring the plant to the Lido Deck. I'll have activated the holo-detector. Now hurry! Auto's probably going to cut me off --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The screens all go dead. Eve and Wall-E look at each other with determination. They're about to continue on when...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A WALL OF STEWARDS block their path.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Halt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dozens of them stand in a row. Eve fires her gun. Destroys a steward. Another one quickly takes its place. Traps her arm with its SUSPENSION BEAM. She can't shoot. The stewards advance, when suddenly...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...the Rejects charge the stewards:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...The beautician-bot deflects rays with her mirrors... ...The vacu-bot sneezes dust in their faces...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...The defib-bot shocks them with her paddles... ...The umbrella-bot opens up... ...Shields the others from the attack...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A weak Wall-E activates his welding beam. Shorts out the Massage-bot's ENERGY STRAIGHTJACKET. It goes berserk. Leaps at the entire army of Stewards. Robot parts fly everywhere. Eve and Wall-E can't watch the carnage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He sets Eve's CYLINDRICAL DEVICE on the floor behind him. It projects her stored memories.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto watches steward blips disappear from his screen. A MESSAGE SCREEN pops up. It's the Captain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and he's holding the plant?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ha, ha! Look what I got, Auto!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto's single lens irises wide.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not possible.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's right! The plant! Oh, you want it? Come and get it, Blinky!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain   hovers in front of Eve's memory screen. It projects   a STILL IMAGE OF WALL-E HOLDING THE PLANT. The Captain   blocks the camera's view of Wall-E. Pretends to   be holding the projected plant himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ha ha!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HEARS AUTO coming. Turns off the vid-com.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yanks his bundle of wires out of the wall. The room goes dark again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The aperture opens. Auto lowers into the dark. Cautiously searches the empty room...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Captain? Captain...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PANS across the portraits of other captains... ...past our present Captain... ...The eyes in the portrait dart nervously... -- wait a minute.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain lunges at him. Grabs Auto by the steering wheel. Hangs onto it like Cap'n Ahab in a gale. His lower extremities of no use.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let go. Let go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto panics. Zips back up through the hole in the ceiling. The Captain gets stuck between floors...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What too heavy for ya, huh?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Auto tries to pull free. The Captain won't let go. Auto ends up yanking him through. The Captain rides Auto like a bucking bronco. Auto swings violently back and forth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not getting away from me, one-eye! -- OOF! -- Is that all you got?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gopher drops out of his pneumatic tube. Sees the Captain fighting Auto. Charges at the Captain...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...who kicks him straight out the window...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gopher plummets... ...his SHADOW growing over the POOL... ...and smashes in a heap on the cement. The end.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We PAN OVER the smoking wreckage of the stewards. The massage-bot floats above it all. Pants like a wild beast. One steward still twitches. The massage-bot crushes him with one blow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve grabs Wall-E and the plant. They take off for the Concourse Level. M-O and the Rejects follow behind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's it!...A little closer! Must..press...button.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain reaches his one free hand out for... ...the HOLO-DETECTOR BUTTON.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gotcha! Ha ha!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His hand slams down hard on it. KLAXONS sound all over the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Floodlights kick on everywhere... ...The LIDO DECK POOLS automatically cover up... ...Stray PASSENGERS pause to take in the alarms... ...SPACE-LIFE PRESERVERS burst from their hover chairs... ...Inflate around their necks... ...GREEN LINES appear on the floors... ...SLEEPING PASSENGERS are involuntarily led out of their cabins... ...Every hover chair follows the illuminated lines...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The procedure is completely automated. The passengers are all confused. Helpless to stop it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The passengers glide in by the thousands. Form concentric circles over the closed-up pools. Fill the multi-storied balconies on all sides.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They arrive together at the Lido Deck. Mary notices a group of toddlers scared and crying. A NANNY-BOT tries vainly to placate them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Remain calm. Remain calm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The BNL LOGO on the floor rotates. A large cylindrical device rises from the stage...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...The ship's HOLO-DETECTOR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JUMBOTRONS activate on the dome. Show the bridge. Everyone can see the Captain wrestling Auto. He tries to speak to them during the fight:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (strained; in command) Ladies and Gentlemen! This is your Captain speaking! We're having a slight malfunction with the Autopilot! Please remain calm!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The passengers get caught up in the conflict. Treat it as if it were a televised fight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve and Wall-E fly out of the transport tunnel. Make a beeline for the holo-detector. Ready and waiting for the plant...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...almost there...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Enough.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto furiously spins his wheel. Throws the Captain to the floor. The entire ship lists dangerously to one side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve and Wall-E slam into the holo-detector's side. Wall-E drops the plant. It tumbles off the bridge plaza. Eve is forced to set Wall-E down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He clings to the holo-detector. She flies off to retrieve the plant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hover chairs stay locked on their lines. Passengers all slip off their chairs. Their uniform color defaults back to RED. Slowly slide across the deck. And for the first time... ...all of humanity reaches out to one another. CLOSE UPS of hands holding hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone piles up on the listing side. The plant is buried underneath the mass of humanity. Eve searches desperately amongst them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON JOHN & MARY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They hang together off their chairs. CRYING TODDLERS just above them. The kiddies slip out of their hover rings. Mary GASPS in horror. Yells to John:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John, get ready to have some kids!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They purposefully let go of their chairs. Grab hands, forming a human chain. Catch the toddlers. All slide together down the Lido Deck. The TODDLERS GIGGLE the whole way down. They land at the bottom, next to Eve.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An empty monorail car tips off the upper deck... ...lands on the pool level. It begins sliding down the Lido Deck. Smashes vacant hover chairs in its wake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Gasp) LOOK OUT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve looks   up. Sees the Monorail sliding towards them. She stops   the car before it hits. Struggles   to hold it up. Can't let   it crush the passengers below her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto keeps the ship tilted. Glides over to the HOLO-DETECTOR BUTTON. Switches it off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The holo-detector begins to lower back into the floor... Wall-E is still hanging onto it. Barely functioning. He uses all his strength...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and wedges himself under the UPPER LIP of the detector

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stops it from disappearing into the floor. The pressure squeezes Wall-E into a box.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The holo-detector button buzzes and flashes. Something's wrong. Auto calls up a LIDO DECK SECURITY CAMERA VIEW. Discovers Wall-E wedged in the device.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto presses down on the "off" button.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The holo-detector's hydraulics fight against him. Wall-E desperately fights to hold it up. Begins slowly to expand himself...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and push the holo-detector back up!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain watches Wall-E's heroic rise on screen. Auto flips out his TASER. Jams it into the "off" button. Short circuits it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NO!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The holo-detector reverses full force. Crushes Wall-E. We can't tell if he survived the crush.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve calls out for him. Trapped, holding up the monorail car above the passengers

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain watches Wall-E being crushed. That's it. He braces his arms against the floor...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and rises up on HIS OWN TWO FEET...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The passengers collectively GASP. Their Captain is standing... ...and walking himself up the railing... ...towards Auto! They CHEER!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto hears the distant cheering. Wonders what's up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto whips around. Shocked to see the Captain standing (albeit wobbly). Finds himself face to face with him. Auto flips out his TASER. Rushes at him. The Captain grabs it. They wrestle. The taser ARCS in the Captain's face. He flinches. Looks up. Sees a CONTROL PANEL high up on Auto's column...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and smirks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain looks Auto in the eye. Raises a finger up to the control panel... ...to the "AUTOPILOT" BUTTON... ...and flicks the switch to "MANUAL".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (grits his teeth) Auto, you are relieved of duty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noo --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto is instantly turned off. The Captain smiles triumphantly. Grabs the wheel with both hands. Makes the ship level again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The passengers all spill across the deck. Shaken but OK. Eve sets the monorail down. Rockets over to the holo-detector.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E is pinned under the lip of the holo-detector. Eve tries to lift it up. It won't budge. She looks back to the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He searches the crowd for the plant. Humans begin to stand for the first time all around him. Through his POV he spots the plant mixed in among them. "FOREIGN CONTAMINANT" flashes on his display screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She fights to keep the machine from crushing Wall-E furth

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ee-vah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: M-O holds the plant up from across the Lido Deck. The vacu-bot shoots it into the hands of a passenger. Humans and robots form an impromptu fire line. Toss it up to Eve on stage. She shoves the plant into the device. The detector instantly scans the plant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plant origin verified. Course set for Earth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slowly, the holo-detector rises... Wall-E topples out from underneath. Badly crushed and leaking oil. Eve GASPS in horror. M-O and the Rejects avert their eyes. Passengers recoil as well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It converts into a GIANT STAR CHART. Rapidly plots a course for Earth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ten seconds to hyperjump.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve lifts Wall-E up. No sign of life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! WALL-E!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: M-O's head drops in despair. The passengers witness grief for the first time. Begin to have new feelings of their own: sadness, sympath Mary begins to cry. Buries her head in John's shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no! Wall-E...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nine, eight, seven, six, five, four, three, two, one, zero.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ceiling countdown hits "0:00."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ship jumps to light speed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The passengers and robots are thrown off their feet. Everyone holds on to one another.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain struggles to keep control of the steering whe Fights the G-forces.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Humans and robots hang on for dear life. John and Mary cling to each other and the babies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She holds tightly to Wall-E. Still calling out his name. No response.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Axiom zooms through hyperspace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cockroach waits obediently on the hill. Exactly where Wall-E told him to stay. His antennae twitch with boredom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: appears on the ground. The cockroach watches the dot run down the hillside. The ground begins to shake. Daylight dims. The insect looks to the sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A DARK PATCH grows behind the clouds. Blots out the sunlight. The Axiom's keel breaks through. Its shadow swallows up the entire landscape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cockroach senses his master's return. HUNDREDS OF RED DOTS rush past him. He eagerly chases after them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The city-size starliner lowers gracefully from the sky. Pushes back the clouds to the horizon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The CIRCLE OF DOTS triangulate over the abandoned berth. Converge over the port's LANDING SHAFT. Thousands of feet deep. The ship's keel descends into it. The earth shudders. Trash towers tumble in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Then all is quiet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A ROW OF GIANT DOORS open on the side of the ship. MULTIPLE GANGWAYS automatically extend. Connect with BUILT-IN TERMINALS on the port.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain walks out gingerly. Holding the boot w/ plant. The other passengers step out on their own legs. Wobble like toddlers. They squint up at the harsh sunlight. A commotion is heard from the back. Somebody trying to push through.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: appears out of the crowd. Cradles a BOXED UP WALL-E in her arms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: M-O and the Rejects follow behind her. They rush across the gangway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cockroach meets up with Eve. Climbs up onto Wall-E. Doesn't understand why his master isn't responding. Eve urgently scans the landscape. Locks on to WALL-E'S TRUCK in the distance. She takes to the air. M-O and the Rejects chase after her down the gangway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beeps) [Eve! Wait!]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain respectfully removes his hat. Good luck, friend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The interior is dark and still. Suddenly the junk jingles and clinks as the back door ope Eve flies inside with Wall-E. Sets him on the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She scans the rotating shelves at high speed. Grabs a CAR JACK. Ratchets up Wall-E's crushed body...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...SPARE PARTS being grabbed by Eve... ...Frantically installs the new parts into Wall-E... ...Her arms a blur of precision in motion... ...Replaces his damaged CIRCUIT BOARD. The final piece... ...She opens his new solar panels...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and BLASTS a hole in the ceiling with her gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The rejects stop. See the roof of Wall-E's truck explode. Oh no.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A shaft of sunlight beams down on Wall-E. Eve holds her breath, watches... Waits...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Beep... ...Beep...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Apple "reboot" SFX)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E's meter fully charges. His head slowly rises from his box. Blinks. The cockroach hops with joy. Eve is relieved.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...She holds out her hand to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (with love) Wall-E...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E gives her a blank stare. He turns away from Eve. Motors out the truck. She grabs him. Turns him back around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (It's me!) Eve!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E just stares. Doesn't seem to know who she is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (hums) [Here, look at these.]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She grabs the RUBIK'S CUBE and LIGHT BULB from the shelf. The light bulb glows in her hand. She gives them to Wall-E. No reaction.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Remember?) Wall-E?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E looks blankly at the junk on the shelves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (hums) [I know!]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She hovers over to the video player. Plays HELLO DOLLY. Looks back to see if it has any effect.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E is over at the shelves. Has scooped all his prized possessions into his compactor Crushes them into a cube. Eve is gut-punched.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E motors outside. Runs over the cockroach on his way out. The insect pops back to life. Watches his friend in shock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E rolls up to a nearby trash pile. Scoops up trash. Spits out a cube. Eve hovers over to him. Still in disbelief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (somber) No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E continues to stack his cubes. She stops him. Lifts his head. Stares into his eyes. Nobody home. Eve presses his "play" button. Nothing but STATIC. Eve begins to panic. Shakes him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E...Wall-E! WALL-E!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No response. He's gone. She hovers in silence next to him for a long time...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finally, Eve grasps Wall-E's hand. Forces his fingers to interlace with hers. Holds him close one last time. Leans her head against his. Hums softly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: [Hums IOTAM]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She touches her forehead to his. Goodbye Wall-E. A TINY SPARK between them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve turns to hover away. Jerked back. Her fingers caught between his. She checks his eyes again. Nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But then...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...a tiny SERVO NOISE. She looks down at their hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They start to move. Slowly close around Eve's.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks back at his face. Wall-E's eyes gradually come into focus. His brows raise...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ee-vah?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He notices their hands entwined. His dream come true.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (amazed) Ee-vah!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She giggles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The "Hello Dolly" tape reaches the finale of IOTAM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "And that is all that love's about..."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve and Wall-E stare into each other's eyes. M-O and the Rejects finally reach the truck. They begin to celebrate. Wall-E's alive! Then M-O realizes they need privacy. Herds the Rejects O.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go! Go, go go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-E and Eve's foreheads touch. Together now and ever more.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "...and we'll recall when time runs out..."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Newly planted in the earth. Small hands water it gently. PULL OUT to reveal it surrounded by kids. The Captain instructs them. John and Mary help unload equipment from the Axiom. Robots and passengers stream off the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is called "farming"! You kids are going to grow all kinds of plants: vegetable plants, pizza plants! (laughs) Ahh, it's good to be home...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The CAMERA PULLS OUT from the Axiom... ...over the bay...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "...That it only took a moment..."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...past Wall-E & Eve holding hands in his truck... ...over M-O and the Rejects cleaning outside... ...Through the trash towers of the city... ...past a FIELD OF PLANTS, sprouting from its peak... ...up through the cloud cover... ...out into space...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "...To be loved a whole life long."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and settles on... ...our single... ...drab... ...brown... ...little planet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE END
